documentation.title: Language Construct Spacing
documentation.standard: Language constructs must contain a single space between themselves and their content. This sniff supports the following language constructs: echo, print, return, include, include_once, require, require_once, new, yield, yield from, throw, namespace and use.

code.title: Valid: Single space after language construct.
Invalid: No space, more than one space or newline after language construct.
